text: xander_harris You know how I feel about you . It 's , uh , pretty obvious , is n't it ? There 's never been anyone else for me ... but you . And we 're good friends , and it 's time to take the next step .
xander_harris Would you , um ... date me ? Oh that 's good ! Date me ! It 's terrible , right ?
willow_rosenberg Huh ? Oh , no ! Oh , yes , ' date me ' is silly ... .

xander_harris See , what I should do is I should just start with talking about the dance . Y'know , Buffy , Spring Fling just is n't any dance . It 's a time for students to choose , um ... a mate and then we can ... observe their ... mating rituals and tag them before they migrate . Just kill me !
willow_rosenberg You 're doing fine !
xander_harris Why 's it so hard ? I should just walk up to her and say , ' Hey , I like you . Let 's go to the dance together . '
willow_rosenberg Direct and to the point .
xander_harris I 'm ready . I wanna do it now . I * got ta * do it now .
willow_rosenberg Oh , Buffy 's not here . You can practice on me some more .
xander_harris No , no , I ca n't wait until tomorrow , I - I'll be thinking about it too much . Why did n't Buffy show up tonight ? What 's she doing ?
willow_rosenberg Oh , you know , the usual .
cordelia_chase What was that ?
kevin What was what ?
cordelia_chase Someone 's out there .
kevin That 's silly ! Who would be out there ?
buffy_summers Three in one night . Giles would be so proud .
rupert_giles Ho korias phanaytie toutay ... tay nuktee . ' The Master shall rise ... ' Yes , yes , this is it ! ' The Master shall rise , and the Slayer ... ' My God !
xander_harris Under the stairs ! Under the stairs !
the_master Yes ! YES ! Shake , Earth ! This is a sign ! We are in the final days ! My time has come ! Glory ! GLORY !
the_master Whadaya think ? 5.1 ?
buffy_summers Morning !
buffy_summers Wow . The damage looks fairly structural . Are we safe in here ?
rupert_giles Buffy !
buffy_summers What ? Do I have something on my face ?
rupert_giles No ! Uh , and , and yes , we 're , we 're safe . Uh , but probably best not to go up there .
buffy_summers How 're you doin' there , Giles ? Get much sleep last night ?
rupert_giles Um ... I - I - I've been working .

buffy_summers Me , too . I went hunting last night , and it is awfully sweet of you to ask . It 's getting hairy out there , Giles . I killed three vampires last night , and one of them was practically on school grounds .
rupert_giles Their numbers are increasing .
buffy_summers And they 're getting cockier . Look , I 'm not loving it . Last night was a pretty close call .
rupert_giles Yes .

buffy_summers Giles , care ? I 'm putting my life on the line battling the undead . Look , I broke a nail , okay ? I 'm wearing a press - on . The least you could do is exhibit some casual interest . You could go , ' hmm ' .
rupert_giles Hmm ? Oh , sorry . Um , yes , I 'm very glad that you 're alright . Uh , I - I need to verify , um ... I just ca n't really talk right now .
buffy_summers Fine . That 's okay . I ca n't put it off any longer . I have to meet my terrible fate .
rupert_giles What ? !
buffy_summers Biology .
buffy_summers Wow . That was boring .
xander_harris I do n't feel that boring covers it .
buffy_summers No , boring falls short .
willow_rosenberg Even I was bored . And I 'm a science nerd .
buffy_summers Do n't say that .
willow_rosenberg I 'm not ashamed . It 's the computer age . Nerds are in . They 're still in , right ?
xander_harris Willow , do n't you have a thing ?
willow_rosenberg A thing ? The thing ! That I have ! Which is ... a thing that I have to go to .
willow_rosenberg See ya later .
buffy_summers What on earth is her deal ?
xander_harris Uh , she 's Willow . So , uh , Buffy , I wanted to , um ... There was this thing I wanted to ask you , to talk to you about .
buffy_summers Okay , what 's up ?
xander_harris Uh , let 's go over here and sit .
buffy_summers Okay , now you 're making me nervous .
xander_harris Oh , no , no , there 's nothing to be nervous about . Really , it 's silly . Ha , ha !
xander_harris Hey . Leave . Thanks .
buffy_summers Well ?
xander_harris Um ... You know , Buffy , uh , Spring Fling is a ... time for students to gather and ... Oh , God ! Buffy , I want you to go to the dance with me . You and me , on a date .
buffy_summers I - I do n't know what to say .

xander_harris Well , you 're not laughing . So that 's a good start . Buffy , I like you . A lot . And I know we 're friends , and we 've had experiences ... We 've fought some blood - sucking fiends , and that 's all been a good time . But I want more . I wanna dance with you .
buffy_summers Xander , you 're one of my best friends . You and Willow ... .
xander_harris Well , Willow 's not looking to date you . Or if she is , she 's playing it pretty close to the chest .
buffy_summers I do n't want to spoil the friendship that we have .
xander_harris Well , I do n't want to spoil it either . But that 's not the point , is it ? You either feel a thing or you do n't .
buffy_summers I do n't . Xander , I 'm , I 'm sorry . I - I just do n't think of you that way .
xander_harris Well , try . I 'll wait .
buffy_summers Xander ... .
xander_harris Nah . Forget it . I 'm not him . I mean , I guess a guy 's got ta be undead to make time with you .
buffy_summers That 's really harsh .
xander_harris Look , I 'm sorry . I do n't handle rejection well . Funny ! Considering all the practice I 've had , huh ?
buffy_summers Xander , I 'm sorry , I do n't know ... .
xander_harris You know what ? Let 's just not .
rupert_giles Hello . Uh , this is Giles . Uh ... Uh , Rupert Giles .
rupert_giles I - I need to see you . No , I - I realize that . Uh ... Come after sundown . Good . I 'll see you then .
jenny_calendar You know , that outfit looks just like the one you wore yesterday . Only wrinklier . Were you here all night ?
rupert_giles Sorry , uh ... I 'm not really up to , uh , socializing just now .
jenny_calendar Something 's going on , Rupert , and I 'm guessing you already know what it is .
rupert_giles What do you know ?

jenny_calendar Well , I have been surfing the ' Net , looking for unexplained incidents . You know , people are always sending stuff my way . They know the occult 's my turf . Now , here is the latest . A cat last week gave birth to a litter of snakes . A family was swimming in Whisper Lake when the lake suddenly began to boil . And Mercy Hospital last night , a boy was born with his eyes facing inward . I 'm not stupid . This is apocalypse stuff . And throw in last night 's earthquake , and I 'd say we 've got a problem . I would say the end is pretty seriously nigh .
rupert_giles I do n't know if I can trust you .

jenny_calendar I helped you cast that demon out of the Internet . I think that merits some trust . Look , I 'm scared , okay ? Oh , plus , I 've got this , this crazy monk e - mailing me from Cortona about some Anointed One ?
rupert_giles The Anointed One ? He 's dead !
jenny_calendar Someone 's dead ?
rupert_giles Uh , who is this monk ?
jenny_calendar Uh , a brother Luca something ? Keeps sending out global mailings about a prophecy .
rupert_giles I need you to talk to him , find out everything he knows .
jenny_calendar Look , Rupert , you have n't told me jack , so what 's with the order ?
rupert_giles Just do it ! I 'll e - explain later .
jenny_calendar You better .
kevin I 'll get everything tonight after practice . The guys'll help me .
cordelia_chase Well , it 's all in the A - V room . The sound system , and the decorations ... And , oh , Aura needs help , um , moving the coolers .
kevin Do n't sweat it !
cordelia_chase Well , bring everything to the Bronze , and I 'll meet you there in the morning !
kevin Done !
cordelia_chase You 're so sweet ! Why 're you so sweet ?
kevin I dunno ! 'Cause I 'm usually mean as a snake !
cordelia_chase Willow ! I 'll see you in the morning .
kevin Okay .
cordelia_chase Willow ! I really like your outfit !
willow_rosenberg No , you do n't .
cordelia_chase No , I really do n't , but I need a favor .
willow_rosenberg What kind ?
cordelia_chase Well , the Bronze wo n't let us use their sound system , and I need someone who knows how to hook one up . If you could just show up tomorrow morning ... .
cordelia_chase ... I 'd be really , really grateful ! I mean , I 'd talk to you at the dance and everything .
willow_rosenberg Sure .
cordelia_chase Great ! Tomorrow at ten ?
willow_rosenberg Sure .
willow_rosenberg Hey !
xander_harris Hey !
willow_rosenberg How 'd it go ?
xander_harris On a scale of one to ten ? It sucked .
willow_rosenberg Oh .
xander_harris Well , I guess it could be worse . I could have gangrene on my face .
willow_rosenberg Well , what 'd she say ?
xander_harris Apart from ' no ' , does it really matter ? She 's still jonesin ' for Angel , and could care less about me .
willow_rosenberg At least now you know .

xander_harris Yeah , you 're right . The deal 's done . The polls are in , and it 's time for my concession speech . Hey , I know what we 'll do ! We can go ! Be my date ! We 'll , we 'll have a great time ! We 'll dance , we 'll go wild ... Whadaya say ?
willow_rosenberg No .
xander_harris Good ! What ?
willow_rosenberg There 's no way .
xander_harris Willow , come on !
willow_rosenberg You think I wanna go to the dance with you and watch you wish you were at the dance with her ? You think that 's my idea of hijinks ? You should know better .
xander_harris I did n't think .
willow_rosenberg I 'm sorry it did n't work out for you . I 'll see you on Monday .
xander_harris That 's okay . I do n't wanna go . I 'm just gon na go home , lie down and listen to country music . The music of pain .
buffy_summers Giles , you are not gon na believe this .
rupert_giles It 's clear . It 's what 's gon na happen . Uh , it 's happening now !
buffy_summers Angel ?
angel It ca n't be . You 've got ta be wrong .
rupert_giles I 've checked it against all my other volumes . It 's very real .
angel Well , there 's got ta be some way around it .

rupert_giles Listen . Some prophecies are , are a bit dodgy . They 're , they 're mutable . Buffy herself has , has thwarted them time and time again , but this is the Codex . There is nothing in it that does not come to pass .
angel Then you 're reading it wrong .
rupert_giles I wish to God I were ! But it 's very plain ! Tomorrow night Buffy will face the Master , and she will die .
angel Well , have you verified the text ?
buffy_summers So that 's it , huh ? I remember the drill . One Slayer dies , next one 's called ! Wonder who she is . Will you train her ? Or will they send someone else ?
rupert_giles Buffy , I ... .
buffy_summers They say how he 's gon na kill me ? Do you think it 'll hurt ?
buffy_summers Do n't touch me ! Were you even gon na tell me ?
rupert_giles I was hoping that I would n't have to . That there was ... . some way around it . I ... .
buffy_summers I 've got a way around it . I quit !
angel It 's not that simple .
buffy_summers I 'm making it that simple ! I quit ! I resign , I - I'm fired , you can find someone else to stop the Master from taking over !
rupert_giles I 'm not sure that anyone else can . All the ... . the signs indicate ... .
buffy_summers The signs ? READ ME THE SIGNS ! TELL ME MY FORTUNE ! YOU'RE SO USEFUL SITTING HERE WITH ALL YOUR BOOKS ! YOU'RE REALLY A LOTTA HELP !
rupert_giles No , I do n't suppose I am .
angel I know this is hard .
buffy_summers What do you know about this ? You 're never gon na die !
angel You think I want anything to happen to you ? Do you think I could stand it ? We just got ta figure out a way ... .
buffy_summers I already did . I quit , remember ? Pay attention !
rupert_giles Buffy , if the Master rises ... .
buffy_summers I do n't care ! I do n't care . Giles , I 'm sixteen years old . I do n't wanna die .
joyce_summers Hi , honey . You alright ?
buffy_summers Sure .
joyce_summers Probably just full from that bite of dinner you nearly had .
joyce_summers Feel like telling me what 's on your mind ?
buffy_summers Mom , let 's go away !
joyce_summers What ?
buffy_summers Anywhere , just for a while , all weekend !
joyce_summers Honey , I ... .
buffy_summers No , it 'll be great ! You and me , a mother - daughter thing ... We can talk about all the embarrassing things you love to bring up .
joyce_summers You know the gallery 's open on weekends .
buffy_summers Mom , please !
joyce_summers Is n't the Prom tomorrow night ? Or Spring Fling , whatever they 're calling it ?
buffy_summers I - I guess .
joyce_summers Nobody asked you ?
buffy_summers Oh , someone ... .
joyce_summers But not the right someone . See , sometimes I actually do know what you 're thinking . Well , then , uh , this probably is n't the best time for this , but , uh ... .
joyce_summers I saw you eyeing it at the store . I figured ... .
buffy_summers Mom , we ca n't afford this .
joyce_summers The way you 've been eating , we can afford it .
buffy_summers It 's beautiful .
joyce_summers I think you should wear it . To the dance .
buffy_summers No , I - I ca n't go to the dance .
joyce_summers Says who ? Is it written somewhere ? You should do what you want . Homecoming , my freshman year of college . I did n't have a date , so I got dressed up and I went anyway .
buffy_summers Was it awful ?
joyce_summers It was awful . For about an hour .
buffy_summers Then what happened ?
joyce_summers I met your father .
buffy_summers He did n't have a date either ?
joyce_summers He did . And that 's a much funnier story that you will * not * get to hear . Oh , but it was a beautiful night !
buffy_summers And you had your whole life ahead of you .
joyce_summers Yeah .
buffy_summers Must be nice .
cordelia_chase Oh , Kevin said that he 'd bring everything to the Bronze last night . He promised ! We 'll never get everything ready in time .
willow_rosenberg He probably forgot . It 's not * that * big a deal .
cordelia_chase Uh , you do n't understand . I 'm not mad ! He totally flaked on me . On me ! And I do n't even care . God help me , I think it 's cute ! Oh ... .
cordelia_chase There they are ! They 're watching cartoons . That 's so cu ... That 's not cute . That 's annoying . I 'm annoyed .
willow_rosenberg Right . I 'm furious .
cordelia_chase Men . I do n't know why we put up with them .
willow_rosenberg I hear ya .
cordelia_chase Obviously , Kevin has underestimated the power of my icy stare .
cordelia_chase Oh , my God ! Kevin ! No !
cordelia_chase Kevin !
joyce_summers Buffy ? ! There 's something on the news . Willow .
willow_rosenberg I 've seen so much .
willow_rosenberg I thought I could take anything . But , Buffy , this ... this was different .
buffy_summers It 'll be alright .
willow_rosenberg I 'm trying to think how to say it ... to explain it so you understand .
buffy_summers It does n't matter as long as you 're okay .

willow_rosenberg I 'm not okay . I knew those guys . I go to that room every day . And when I walked in there , it ... it was n't our world anymore . They made it theirs . And they had fun . What are we gon na do ?
buffy_summers What we have to . Promise me you 'll stay in tonight , okay ?
willow_rosenberg Buffy ?
willow_rosenberg I like your dress .
buffy_summers Take care .
the_master Soon .
the_master Soon !

jenny_calendar Okay , so this Master guy tried to open the Hellmouth . But he got stuck in it , and now all the signs are reading that he 's gon na get out , which opens the Hellmouth , which brings the demons , which ends the world .
rupert_giles Yes . That about sums it up , yes .
jenny_calendar The part that gets me , though , is where Buffy is the Vampire Slayer . She 's so little .
rupert_giles You know how to get in touch with this , uh , brother Luca chap ?
jenny_calendar Hmm . As far as I can tell , no one can . He 's disappeared . Did send out one last global though . A short one .
rupert_giles What did it say ?
jenny_calendar Isaiah 11:6 , which I dutifully looked up .
rupert_giles ' The wolf shall live with the lamb , the leopard shall lie down with the kid , the calf , the lion and the fatling together , and the little child to lead them . '
jenny_calendar That 's kinda warm and fuzzy for a message of doom .
rupert_giles Well , that depends where he 's leading them to . Aurelius wrote of the Anointed One , ' The Slayer will not know him , and he will lead her into Hell . '
jenny_calendar So Luca thinks the Anointed is a kid .
rupert_giles If the vampire that Buffy killed was in fact not the Anointed , then it may well be .
jenny_calendar Well , then we need to warn her .
rupert_giles I do n't intend involving her at all .
jenny_calendar What do you mean ?
rupert_giles Buffy 's not gon na face the Master . I am .
buffy_summers No , you 're not .
buffy_summers So , I 'm looking for a kid , huh ? And he 'll lead me to the Master ?

rupert_giles Buffy , I 'm not gon na send you out there to die . Now , you were right . I - I've waded around in these old books for so long , I 've forgotten what the real world is like . I - it 's time I found out .
buffy_summers You 're still not going up against the Master .
rupert_giles I 've made up my mind .
buffy_summers So have I.
rupert_giles I made up my mine first ! I 'm older and wiser than you , and just ... just do what you 're told for once ! Alright ?
buffy_summers That 's not how it goes . I 'm the Slayer .
rupert_giles I do n't care what the books say . I defy prophecy , and I am going . There 's nothing you can say will change my mind .
buffy_summers I know .
buffy_summers When he wakes up tell him ... I do n't know . Think of something cool , tell him I said it .
jenny_calendar You fight the Master , and you 'll die .
buffy_summers Maybe . Maybe I 'll take him with me .
collin Help me ... .
buffy_summers It 's okay . I know who you are .
xander_harris She what ?
willow_rosenberg I told you there was something going on with her .
xander_harris And she knew about this prophecy of yours ? Aw , man , what do we do ?
rupert_giles We stay calm , first thing .
xander_harris Calm ?
willow_rosenberg I think he 's right .
xander_harris I 'm sorry , calm may work for Locutus of the Borg here , but I 'm freaked out , and I intend to stay that way .
willow_rosenberg Xander ... .
xander_harris How could you let her go ?
rupert_giles As the soon - to - be - purple area of my jaw will attest , I did * not * * let * her go !
willow_rosenberg Well , how can we help her ?
jenny_calendar Uh , I 'm sorry to bring this up , but we also have an apocalypse to worry about ?
xander_harris Do you mind ?
willow_rosenberg How come she 's in the club ?
jenny_calendar Hey ! Once the Master gets free , the Hellmouth opens , the demons come to party , and everybody dies .
xander_harris Uh , uh , I do n't care . I 'm sorry , I do n't . Right now I got ta help Buffy .
rupert_giles We do n't even know where she 's gone .
xander_harris No . But I can find out .
angel Oh . Look who 's here .
xander_harris Mind if I come in ?
angel Make yourself at home .
xander_harris She 's gone .
angel Whadaya mean ?
xander_harris Buffy , she 's gone to fight the Master .
angel He 'll kill her .
xander_harris Rumor has it . Only we 're not gon na let it happen .
angel Well , what do you propose we do about it ?
xander_harris Look , I know you can find this Master guy . He 's underground , right ? Take me to him .
angel You 're way outta your league , kid . The Master'll kill you before you can even breathe . If you 're lucky .
xander_harris How can I say this clearly ?

xander_harris I do n't like you . At the end of the day , I pretty much think you 're a vampire . But Buffy 's got this big old yen for you . She thinks you 're a real person . And right now I need you to prove her right .
angel You 're in love with her .
xander_harris Are n't you ?
rupert_giles The Master is as old as any vampire on record . There 's no telling how powerful he 'll be if he reaches the surface .
jenny_calendar Okay , here 's my question : the Hellmouth opens .
rupert_giles Yes .
jenny_calendar Where ? If he 's underground , and it 's right where he is , where 's it gon na open ?
rupert_giles Good point . Uh , well , look , you have a look through the Black Chronicles ... .
jenny_calendar Okay .
rupert_giles Uh , Willow ? Willow ?
willow_rosenberg Huh ?
rupert_giles Could you look through the local histories , please . Check for any common denominators , uh , locations of incidences and such .
willow_rosenberg Right , okay .
the_master Welcome .
buffy_summers Thanks for having me .
buffy_summers Y'know , you really oughtta talk to your contractor . Looks like you got some water damage .
the_master Oh , good . The feeble banter portion of the fight . Why do n't we just cut to the ... .
the_master Nice shot .
angel This way . What ?
xander_harris You were looking at my neck .
angel What ?
xander_harris You were checking out my neck ! I saw that !
angel No , I was n't !
xander_harris Just keep your distance , pal .
angel I was n't looking at your neck !
xander_harris I told you to eat before we left .
the_master You 're not going to kill me with that thing .
buffy_summers Do n't be so sure .
the_master You still do n't understand your part in all this , do you ? You are not the hunter . You are the lamb .
rupert_giles Well , let 's think about this , then . The vampires have been gathering , they know he 's coming , they will be his army .
jenny_calendar Do you think they 'll gather at the Hellmouth ?
willow_rosenberg Well , the last time the Master tried to rise was the Harvest . He sent a bunch of vampires to get him fresh blood .
jenny_calendar Well , where did that go down ?
rupert_giles The Bronze .
willow_rosenberg The Prom !
rupert_giles We have to warn them .
jenny_calendar No ! We 'll go . You have to concentrate on demon killing . My car 's in the lot .
rupert_giles Stay close together , and for goodness ' sake , be careful !
willow_rosenberg We will .
buffy_summers You know , for someone who 's all powerful , you sure do like to hide .
the_master I 'm waiting for you . I want this moment to last .
buffy_summers Well , I do n't .
the_master I understand .
willow_rosenberg What if they get to the Bronze before we do ?
jenny_calendar Do n't need to worry about that !
willow_rosenberg Why not ?
jenny_calendar 'Cause they 're not goin' to the Bronze .

the_master You tried . It was noble of you . You heard the prophecy that I was about to break free and you came to stop me . But prophecies are tricky creatures . They do n't tell you everything . You 're the one that sets me free ! If you had n't come , I could n't go . Think about that !
the_master Oh , God ! The power !
the_master And by the way ... .
the_master I like your dress .
xander_harris What was that ?
angel It 's too late . He 's gone up .
angel She 's dead !
xander_harris No . She 's not dead .
angel She 's not breathing .
xander_harris But if she drowned , uh , there 's a shot ! CPR !
angel You have to do it . I have no breath .
xander_harris C'mon . C'mon !
jenny_calendar Why are they coming here ?
willow_rosenberg Not caring !
cordelia_chase Get in !
xander_harris C'mon ! Breathe ! Breathe !
xander_harris C'mon !
xander_harris Buffy !
xander_harris Buffy .
buffy_summers Xander ?
xander_harris Welcome back .
cordelia_chase I was sitting where Kevin and I used to park , and all of a sudden these things are coming at me !
jenny_calendar What do we do now ?
willow_rosenberg We 've got ta get to the library !
cordelia_chase Library ! Great !
willow_rosenberg Of course , we generally walk there .
rupert_giles What the ... .
rupert_giles What 's happening ?
jenny_calendar Guess !
rupert_giles Why are they coming here ? !
the_master My world ! Oh , my beautiful world !
xander_harris Easy . Easy .
buffy_summers The Master ?
angel He 's gone up .
xander_harris No . You 're still weak .
buffy_summers No . No , I feel strong . I feel different . Let 's go !
rupert_giles They 're coming in through the stacks !
jenny_calendar C'mon !
jenny_calendar The bookshelves !
rupert_giles My office ... .
cordelia_chase Somebody help !
xander_harris So , how do you know where the Master 's going ?
buffy_summers I know .
buffy_summers Oh , look , a bad guy .
buffy_summers Okay , you two wait here , keep the rest of the vampires off me .
xander_harris Right .
buffy_summers Angel , better put on your game face .
angel I 'm ready .
buffy_summers One way or another , this wo n't take long .
cordelia_chase See how * you * like it !
willow_rosenberg This wo n't keep 'em out for long !
jenny_calendar GILES ! GILES !
rupert_giles The Hellmouth !
the_master Yes . Come forth , my child . Come into my world .
buffy_summers I do n't think it 's yours just yet .
the_master You 're dead !
buffy_summers I may be dead , but I 'm still pretty . Which is more than I can say for you .
the_master You were destined to die ! It was written !
buffy_summers What can I say ? I flunked the written .
the_master Come here !
jenny_calendar GIIILES !
jenny_calendar GILES !
the_master Did you really think you could best me here when you could n't below ?
buffy_summers You have fruit punch mouth .
the_master What ?
buffy_summers Save the hypnosis crap for the tourists .
the_master Where are your jibes now ?
the_master You laugh when my Hell is on Earth ?
buffy_summers You 're that amped about Hell ... Go there !
rupert_giles The vampires ?
cordelia_chase Gone .
angel The Master ?
rupert_giles Dead . The Hellmouth is closed . Buffy ... Buffy ?
buffy_summers Oh , sorry . It 's just been a really weird day .
xander_harris Yeah ! Buffy died , and everything !
willow_rosenberg Wow ! Harsh .
rupert_giles I should have known that would n't stop you .
jenny_calendar Well , what do we do now ?
rupert_giles I do n't know about the rest of you , but I 'd like to get out of this place . I do n't like the library very much anymore .
xander_harris Hey ! I hear there 's a dance at the Bronze tonight . Could be fun .
